basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Tim van Broekhoven. I recently graduated as an Electrical Engineer and now I'm commited to chase my dream to become a full stack software developer. I'm currently working with React as my front-end framework and I'm using ExpressJS on the backend. This way, I can emerge myself into the Javascript world. When I finished my current projects, I want to replace ExpressJS for the Django and Flask Python frameworks for backend work to switch it up. So stay tuned to see what I will create next! Thank you ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: My pet project is epicwebapps.com. The goal is to first use this website for freelance work and to turn this into a platform for my own web developement company in the future.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
